net.explorviz.security.server.resources

Class UserResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.security.server.resources.UserResource

  • @Path(value="v1/users")
public class UserResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides several endpoints for user management.

      • updateUser

        @PATCH
 @Path(value="{id}")
 @RolesAllowed(value="admin")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.api+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.api+json")
public net.explorviz.shared.security.model.User updateUser(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               net.explorviz.shared.security.model.User updatedUser)
        Updates the details of a already existing user. The values of the targeted user will be overridden by the values of an updatedUser. All attributes that are null are ignored.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the user to update
        updatedUser - - a User object containing the changes. All fields set to null will be ignored when updating.
        Returns:
        the updated user

                                                                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="batchid")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String batchId)
        Retrieves all users that have a specific role.
        Parameters:
        role - - the role to be searched for
        batchId - - the batchId to search for
        Returns:
        a list of all users with the given role
